page.title: 14BIGGLESWADE:ADULT EDUCATION2
page.content: SELECTION OF NON-VOCATIONAL SUBJECTS: {Monday}evening: Basketball, Dress- making, Ladies Gym and Trampolining, Men's Keep Fit, Yoga 1, Self Defence. {Tuesday}evening: Bobbin lace, Computer Use for Beginners, Cookery courses (5 wks.duration), Painting for Pleasure, Holiday German, Video Making and Yoga. {Wednesday}evening: Badminton Coaching, Drama Workshop, Engineering Metalwork, Guitar, Rushwork & Canework, Keep Fit. {Saturday}afternoon: Golf (3 classes). SELECTION OF VOCATIONAL CLASSES: {Monday}evening: Mathematics (O level), French Beginners, Secretarial Duties RSA II, Shorthand (Beg.),Typewriting. {Tuesday}evening:Typewriting RSA II/III {Wednesday}evening: Air Navigation, English Language (O level), French 2nd Year, Psychology (A level), Spanish Beginners, Italian, Shorthand. Classes are popular and well attended.
